feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Extended Warehouse Management
feed.subtitle: SAP Extended Warehouse Management Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Outbound delivery DTR not replicated in EWM Public cloud
entry.content:
Hello,

 

I have some users which request to change the stock status with the wrong App.

It creates outbound delivery (type DTR), but some of them where not replicated in EWM.

There is nothing in the queue. 

And in S4, I get the message "Delivery can no longer be changed due to the warehouse processing status"

How I can clear these outbound deliveries ?

Thanks,

Emmanuel.

entry.title: Choosing Between SAP Cloud Private Edition and On-Premise for MM & EWM Certification
entry.content:
I’m an Industrial Engineer and new to the SAP field. I’ve recently completed practical training in SAP MM and am now planning to study for certification. However, I’m unsure whether to focus on the Cloud Private Edition or On-Premise version — both for SAP Sourcing and Procurement and SAP EWM.

Since I’m just starting my SAP career, I’d like to make the right choice based on your professional recommendation, as it will determine my learning and certification path.

In your opinion, which version is better to focus on for building a strong and future-oriented SAP career?

Thank you..

entry.title: WM Material Staging successful but no delivery
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I try to execute WM staging for my production order. I create the order in CO01 and released it successfuly.

Afterwards I go into transaction CO02 and with Functions>WM Material staging>Execute I execute WM Material staging. When I look into the log, I can see that WM staging was executed without error.

But I cannot see a delivery in EWM to stage the material.

I already created control cycle and entry in /SCWM/PSASTAGE. I also created a Production scheduling Profile like following.

When I try the staging in LP10, I get the following error.

Does anyone have an Idea what the issue is?

Thanks and Best regards

Kadir

entry.title: For active yard management in warehouse enter a Checkpoint
entry.content:
Hi @JuergenPitz / SCM Community

I have integrated EWM with DAS and have activated YM for my warehouse.

I have found the previous Q&A (linked below) which provides an answer to the error message I am receiving in a qRFC.

Solved: Not able to perform check-in using Shipping Cockpi... - SAP Community

Process steps are as follows,

  1. Created a an inbound TU with Inbound Delivery assigned which has in turn created an appointment in DAS.
  2. Processed the appointment in DAS and set the status of the appointment to Arrived at Checkpoint (status light is Green in DAS)
  3. qRFC in EWM with message For active yard mgmnt in warehouse XXXX enter a Checkpoint

As I have a queue in EWM how can rectify this so EWM receives the update from DAS. The TU linked to the appointment should be arrived at checkpoint and the status should therefore changed from 'Planned' to 'Active'

Any thoughts/suggestions please?

Thanks

Michael

entry.title: ERP doc 0080487683 unable to GI - "HU not assigned to transportation unit"
entry.content: the delivery shows loaded, but not able to be GI"ed with the error mentioned.  The HU is no longer visible in the delivery doc

entry.title: Copy of Printout from SAP Going to Wrong Label Printer (Different Plant) when producing material
entry.content:
Hello, 

So i have a very strange problem and will explain the setup below.. 

Plant 1 has 3x Printers and 3x Computers , PC/Printer 1, PC/Printer 2, PC/Printer 3
They all share the same login details User login = User1 for all 3 computers. 

Each printer in Plant 1 has its own IP.
Host Printer = pr1 (not sure what this means?) Group? 
Destination Host = individual IP for each printer

Each material produced has its own setup, different packaging materials, instructions etc... 


Our SAP is setup for multiple plants. 
Plant 1 (my plant)
Plant 2 (receiving a printout of a label created in Plant 1)
Plant 3
Plant 4


We have a production that produces a material in Plant 1.

We use a custom FIORI app to scan the products in the machine, when the UL is met a label is printed next to the machine. 
(Issue is probably not connected to the FIORI app since the printout occurs even when using SAPSTAT when reporting manually.

We have 3 machines, 3 printers and one user login in Plant 1.

The print output is printed in each printer depending on the material / machine (correct)

But everytime the label is printed in Plant 1 there is a copy printed in Plant2 (Only in one printer that has no settings in Plant 1) 
This printer has both Host printer and Destination Host setup as the printers IP. (Ours has pr1 as host printer)

PI for each material has correct settings.
Masterdata for each material has correct settings. 


Nothing indicates to a printer in Plant 2, but there is still a copy being printed in Plant 2, everytime a material is produced.

Doesn't matter if i use a different login, it will still print a label in Plant 2, so it doesn't seem to be account related.

The label printed in Plant 1 has both Storage Unit number 3000xxxxx and "internal HU number" 823xxxx" 


Label printed in Plant 2, doesnt have the internal HU number. 





I appreciate all the ideas and help i could get. 


BR 
Sebastian

entry.title: Need to restrict certain users from doing posting change for a particular stock types
entry.content:
Hello Experts ,

We received a new requirement from business  on the follow,

  • Certain users alone  ( business provided a list of users  ) need to restricted from doing posting change from Q4 ( Quality ) to F2 (Unrestricted ) and from B6 (blocked ) to F2 (Unrestricted)
  • The Restriction needs to be from EWM monitor.

when we checked with security team they said that it could not be achieved by standard as once they keep some restrictions user could able to view the stock in F2

So,  anyone pls let me know how we can achieve this requirement by means of any SU3 Parameters or Config ?

Please Advice.

Thanks,

Rag

entry.title: Nested Kitting in EWM
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

Im working on Private Cloud EWM Implementation.

There is a scenario where the Kit to Order is having components and in that again one component is having sub components. When we are using Kit to Order, system is picking the only the direct components and not considering the sub components of a Component. Do we have any standard way to handle this scenario or we need custom logic to implement ? Kindly help me . 

Example is like below. :

Product A is having components A, B and C. in this B is having again components B1 , B2 and B3. When we execute the Sales order for Kit to Order, in EWM side system should consider all the components including the subcomponents of B product. 

 

Thanks and Regards

Pavan.

entry.title: Change existing stock items from Non-Batch to Batch Management
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I want to make new warehouse in WM Module. Is there any way to change the material from non-batch to batch-managed in the material master without consume the existing stock. There are almost 300 type of material and 8000 final-product.  Thus, consuming the existing stock is not available for us.

Without batch management, how can I follow material movement by individual (like every product as unique)?

Thank you in advance.

entry.title: Embedded SAP EWM - CKMDUVMAT
entry.content: In embedded SAP EWM, has anyone used t-code CKMDUVMAT for automate distribution of inventory Differences to Production orders, when Physical Inventory happens in EWM Storage location? Is it feasible?

entry.title: Getting Short dump while trying to delete BIN in SAP EWM
entry.content:
Hello Team,

1. We are not able to delete Storage bin in our warehouse 0028. Storage type- LG15, Storage bin-   A-17-3-0

2. While trying to delete we are getting  ASSERTION_FAILED in short dump we can see below error.

If the error occurs in one of your own ABAP programs or an SAP program
that you have modified, try to correct the error yourself.
If the error occurs in a non-modfied SAP program, you might be able to
find a solution in the SAP Notes system. If you have access to the SAP
Notes system, check there first using the following keywords:

"ASSERTION_FAILED"
"/LIME/SAPLCORE" bzw. /LIME/LCORENOI
"SELECT_NODE"
If you cannot solve the problem yourself, please send the following
information to SAP:

1. The description of the problem (short dump)
To do this, choose  System -> List -> Save -> Local File (unconverted)
on the screen you are in now.

2. The relevant system log
To do this, call the system log in transaction SM21. Restrict the time
interval to ten minutes before the short dump and five minutes after
it. In the display, choose System -> Lis

entry.title: We are using SAP S4 HANA 2023 version. Product Group Type and Product group is not visible in MM02.
entry.content: We are using S4 HANA 2023 version. We need to use Product group type and product group to configure Cross Docking. But  found that Product Group Type and Product group is not visible in MM02. Please note that since 2023 these 2 fields re not available in /SAPAPO/MAT1. Your help is appreciated.

i have maintained output determination and packaging instructions its packing but print output  is not getting ,any additional steps are missing please assist

Regards,

Pasha

entry.title: MRP run is not working (MD02) min/max
entry.content: I want to work with a min/max level so that when creating an order, the stock is always replenished up to the maximum level. This should include the open orders. Somehow, I just can’t get it to work—what am I doing wrong? In this example, I would expect the ATB to be 49.200.

Your Inputs are of great help to me.

Regards ,

Chandra

entry.title: Catch Weight in SAP EWM
entry.content:
Dear Community,

The functionality 'Catch Weight' in SAP EWM, is this available in both the basic license as advanced? Or would the advanced license be required to use this functionality within SAP EWM?

entry.title: Understanding Non Valuated Stock and Text Items in SAP MM/EWM: Business Purpose and System Behavior
entry.content: I need clarification on the real business use and purpose of non valuated stock in SAP MM and EWM. What does non valuation actually mean in practice, and in which business processes does it make sense to manage physical stock without assigning a value? I would appreciate concrete examples, including who ultimately pays for these materials and how their consumption is handled financially and in the SAP EWM. I also want to understand whether packaging materials are always non valuated, and if not, what drives that decision. Additionally, since EWM still requires a product and stock representation, how does EWM handle non valuated materials compared to MM? Finally, I want to confirm the concept of text items in SAP EWM, since my understanding is that they do not create deliveries or warehouse tasks, and I would like to know if there are any nuances or exceptions.

entry.title: Custom verification logic for RF transaction in Public Cloud WM
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We are on Public Cloud WM and use RF devices in our warehouse for Inbound / Replenishment process,

One of the requirement is to verify the product using the supplier's barcode printed on the box.

However this barcode is a combination of supplier code + product number + qty (separated by a unique separator) concatenated.

Is there any option / mechanism in Public Cloud WM by which we can decode the product number upon verification of the barcode on the RF device against Product verification field?

Your ideas will be much appreciated.

Regards,

Shashi

entry.title: S4 Public Cloud Custom RF verification
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Please suggest if it is possible to add a custom verification logic for one of the fields on RF(example : product - decode product number from a suppliers barcode - barcode consists of other fields as well, not just product).

Regards,

Shashi
